title: Update cluster version
description: During the update, your cluster master, worker nodes, apps, and resources continue to run. After the update is complete, you can update your worker node versions. For instructions and more information about differences across versions, review the docs.
betaVersion: {{version}} (create a new cluster to try out this beta version)
noUpdatesAvailable: You're using the newest version of the API server. There are no updates available at this time.
clusterUpdating: Your API server is updating to version {{version}}. After it finishes you can update your worker nodes to the same version.
cannotUpdateSubtitle: No valid version update options are available.
versionsErrorSubtitle: Unable to load cluster update version options.
